item.title: What are wallets and why do I need a wallet?
item.description: What are wallets and why do I need a wallet? Wallets allow you to keep track of your cryptocurrency holdings. The most important features of those wallets are the public and the private key. The public key is an identifier for your wallet. It works similar as an username on a social network. With the pubic key someone can send you money. The private key on the other hand is like your pin for your bank account.

item.title: Basic Raspberry Pi Configuration for Headless Mode
Control a Relay with a Raspberry Pi and Python
item.description: With this project I wanted to control a motor over the internet. The motor needs 12-24V DC with 1500mA. It is started through an impulse with the same potential as the power supply. I chose a Raspberry Pi model B for this project, as I had one laying around. As OS I used Raspberry Pi OS Lite on a 8GB SD Card. To control the motor I created a simple Flask API.

item.title: Brag Document
item.description: What is a brag document? A brag document is a list of stuff you did at or besides work. It is great for showing what you did to your manager when it comes to raises. Additionally, it helps you to reflect on what you worked on. I find it useful to see how far you have come and what you have accomplished. How often should I update it? Update it regularly, like weekly or biweekly so you don’t forget anything.
